name: Forged
description:
Local 2 player 2D fighting game.

Controls. Controllers highly recommended.

Controller (Xbox):

  • Move with Left Stick
  • Jump with A
  • Dash with Left Trigger
  • Parry with Right Bumper
  • Attack with Right Trigger

Player 1 Keyboard:

  • Move with WASD
  • Dash with left shift
  • Parry with "R"
  • Attack with spacebar

Player 2 Keyboard:

  • Move with Arrow Keys
  • Dash with ","
  • Parry with "."
  • Attack with "/"
